data.name: plAggregatedForums.Help
data.value: Select whether you would like to provide an aggregated view of threads in all public forums.

data.name: plSearchIndexDate.Help
data.value: This is the date the module was last indexed by the framework's search engine. Click the Reset Date link to make all previous posts exposed to search again.

data.name: plDisableHTMLPosting.Help
data.value: If checked, the rich text editor will not be rendered for posts, instead a multi-line textbox will be used.

data.name: plEnablePostAbuse.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to report each post to moderators/admins using an online interface.

data.name: plEnableThreadStatus.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to set thread status if they started the thread.This is good for things like marking posts as an answer.

data.name: plPrimaryAlias.Help
data.value: The primary alias is used for all outgoing email communication that requires a full path for post images. By default, the first portal alias (if multiple exist) is used unless changed here.
